title: "Enabling AI for Real World Results at Data Summit Connect Fall 2020"
excerpt: "Comprehending natural language text with its first-hand challenges of ambiguity, synonymity, and co-reference has been a long-standing problem in natural language processing. Transfer learning uses some of the models that have been pre-trained on terabytes of data and fine-tunes them based on the problem at hand."
